name: Chugga' Chugga' Chop Chop
description:
CHUGGA' CHUGGA' CHOP CHOP

Chop your way to freedom

Escape doom by feeding the time train!

Controls

Jump with Space (A on controller)

Sprint with Shift (Right Trigger on Controller)

Use Axe with Left or Right click (Right and left Bumper on Controller)

Credits

Music by Grand_Project from Pixabay
